name: 亚历山大·索托
name_full: 亚历山大·索托 Andres Soto
introduction: Andrés Soto Valverde (aka Alexander Soto) is an actor from San José, Costa Rica. He began his career as an engineer and TV Producer. He created along Jatniel Azofeifa the largest kids TV Show in Central America: "Ondivedu".After losing his younger brother (his best friend) he temporarily performed under his brother's name Alexander (Alejandro), as a way to honor him.He studied Communications and Industrial Engineering at the University of Costa Rica and Acting at Vancouver Film School. He now resides in Vancouver, British Columbia. He is known for Yellow Jackets, Debris, DC Legends of Tomorrow, The Good Doctor, and Dragged Across Concrete.
